purpose: To provide a cloud-native, high-performance gateway for managing, distributing, and monitoring AI APIs.
principle: Built on cloud-native principles, it supports multiple AI models and APIs, providing unified API requests, load balancing, and disaster recovery.
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play deployment with support for all major AI APIs, allowing easy integration into existing systems.
limitations: Primarily focused on AI API management; may require customization for non-standard APIs.
name: APIPark
description: 🦄云原生、超高性能 AI&API网关，LLM API 管理、分发系统、开放平台，支持所有AI API，不限于OpenAI、Azure、Anthropic Claude、Google Gemini、DeepSeek、字节豆包、ChatGLM、文心一言、讯飞星火、通义千问、360 智脑、腾讯混元等主流模型，统一 API 请求和返回，API申请与审批，调用统计、负载均衡、多模型灾备。一键部署，开箱即用。Cloud native, ultra-high performance AI&API gateway, LLM API management, distribution system, open platform, supporting all AI APIs.
highlight: Cloud native, ultra-high performance AI&API gateway supporting all major AI APIs with unified request handling and load balancing.
